channel.title: Deposit Box
channel.description:
I'm trying to make the Deposit Box like RS,
Now I Already made the Deposit Box Interface in my client, but how do I make it when the Interface opens my Inventory stuff goes in it and i can click it...?
Any Ideas? (Please help me out!)
I tried looking at a code I have from my ItemsKeptFromDeath, but It's too confusing
Edit:
I tried with sendFrame34 making all the Items into the Deposit Box, but if i right-click the item in it, I only have the option to examine and cancel... Any Further idea's?
